text.section:
In accordance with and to obtain the advantages under Title XII of the Social Security Act the Secretary:
may apply for an advance to the Unemployment Insurance Fund; and
has responsibility for repayment of the advance.

Interest required to be paid on an advance under subsection (a) of this section:
shall be paid in a timely manner; and
may not be paid directly or indirectly from contributions or from the Unemployment Insurance Fund.
